mapper.update: update manager_confirm set mcnfm_st_cd = '02', mcnfm_cnfm_dt = sysdate where mcnfm_id = #{mcnfmId} and mcnfm_st_cd = '01'
update member set manager_cnfm_yn = 'Y' , mcnfm_id = ( select max(mcnfm_id) from manager_confirm where member_id = #{memberId}) where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select distinct b.mcnfm_id, b.member_id, b.mcnfm_co_nm, b.mcnfm_rpspr, b.mcnfm_req_dt, b.mcnfm_cnfm_dt, b.mcnfm_st_cd, b.mcnfm_cntr_sdt, b.mcnfm_cntr_edt, b.mcnfm_cntr_fl_cd, b.mcnfm_cnfmr, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MF' and scode = mcnfm_cntr_fl_cd ) as mcnfm_cntr_fl_nm, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MC' and scode = mcnfm_st_cd ) as mcnfm_st_nm, a.member_fl_cd from manager_confirm b, member a where a.member_fl_cd = 'M' order by mcnfm_st_cd, mcnfm_id, mcnfm_req_dt

select distinct a.mcnfm_id, b.member_id, b.mcnfm_co_nm, b.mcnfm_rpspr, b.mcnfm_req_dt, b.mcnfm_cnfm_dt, b.mcnfm_st_cd, b.mcnfm_cntr_sdt, b.mcnfm_cntr_edt, b.mcnfm_cntr_fl_cd, b.mcnfm_cnfmr, a.ins_dt, a.udt_dt, a.member_birth, a.member_tel, a.member_email, a.member_phone_vld, a.member_profile_nm, a.member_profile_path, a.member_pw, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MF' and scode = mcnfm_cntr_fl_cd ) as mcnfm_cntr_fl_nm, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MC' and scode = mcnfm_st_cd ) as mcnfm_st_nm, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MS' and scode = member_st_cd ) as member_st_nm, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MR' and scode = member_fl_cd ) as member_fl_nm, a.member_fl_cd from manager_confirm b, member a where b.member_id= a.member_id and b.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update manager_confirm set mcnfm_co_nm = #{mcnfmCoNm}, mcnfm_rpspr = #{mcnfmRpspr}, mcnfm_req_dt = #{mcnfmReqDt}, mcnfm_cnfm_dt = #{mcnfmCnfmDt}, mcnfm_st_cd = #{mcnfmStCd}, mcnfm_cntr_sdt = #{mcnfmCntrSdt}, mcnfm_cntr_edt = #{mcnfmCntrEdt}, mcnfm_cntr_fl_cd = #{mcnfmCntrFlCd}, mcnfm_cnfmr = #{mcnfmCnfmr} where member_id = #{memberId}
